content.question: The expansion of suffrage to most adult White men in the early nineteenth century most directly resulted in which of the following?

choices.label: The growth of new political parties
The abolition of slavery in the northern states
The signing of peace treaties with Native Americans
The employment of women in textile manufacturing

content.answer: The growth of new political parties

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
